name: ai_review
description: Demo repository for an 8-minute talk showcasing AI integration in development workflows, focusing on automated linting fixes.

scripts.lint:ai:q: npm run lint:check 2>&1 | q chat --no-interactive --trust-all-tools 'Fix ALL ESLint errors and warnings by modifying the source files. Do not stop until every issue is resolved:'
scripts.lint: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
